ygData.subject: Death!  Death to all GM's
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok Ok, i am really pissed at all gm s.  They change my wizards name, as well as my enchanter, they r being more strict about names in general... more on that,
ygData.messageBody:
Ok Ok, i am really pissed at all gm's. They change my wizards name,
as well as my enchanter, they r being more strict about names in
general... more on that, i started a ranger last night, and i spent a
half hour trying to get a name! 3rdly.... 2 days in a row now i have
been kicked off in the morning because of patches! PATCHES 2 DAYS IN
A ROW (count them, 2). And 4rthly... who here is on brell serillis
server? If u r, my main is Shimminy
